mapper.select: /* AdvertiseDAO.advertiseReqDetail */ select b.advertise_req_no , b.title , b.banner_file_no , get_file_path(b.banner_file_no) as banner_file_path , b.banner_size , b.cancel_yn , b.cancel_date , b.stop_admin_yn , b.deposit_yn , b.price , b.bank_info from tb_hakwon a , tb_advertise_req b where a.master_user_no = #{userNo} and a.hakwon_no = b.hakwon_no and b.advertise_req_no = #{reqNo}

/* AdvertiseDAO.advertiseReqLocalList */ select a.advertise_req_no , a.view_month , case when date_format(now(), '%Y%m') = a.view_month then 'Y' else 'N' end as current_view , a.sido , a.gugun , a.dong , a.banner_size from tb_advertise_local_date a where a.advertise_req_no = #{reqNo} order by a.view_month asc , a.sido asc , a.gugun asc , a.dong asc

/* AdvertiseDAO.regDongBannerList */ select a.dong , b.view_month , sum(b.banner_size) as banner_total_count from (select sido, gugun, dong from tb_address_zip where sido = #{sido} and gugun = #{gugun} group by dong) a , tb_advertise_local_date b , tb_advertise_req c where a.sido = b.sido and a.gugun = b.gugun and a.dong = b.dong and b.view_month BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y%m') and DATE_FORMAT(now() + INTERVAL 11 MONTH,'%Y%m') and b.advertise_req_no = c.advertise_req_no and c.cancel_yn is null group by a.dong , b.view_month order by b.view_month asc , a.dong asc

/* AdvertiseDAO.hakwonRegDongBannerList */ select a.dong , b.view_month , sum(b.banner_size) as banner_total_count from (select sido, gugun, dong from tb_address_zip where sido = #{sido} and gugun = #{gugun} group by dong) a , tb_advertise_local_date b , tb_advertise_req c where a.sido = b.sido and a.gugun = b.gugun and a.dong = b.dong and b.view_month BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y%m') and DATE_FORMAT(now() + INTERVAL 11 MONTH,'%Y%m') and b.advertise_req_no = c.advertise_req_no and c.hakwon_no = #{hakwonNo} and c.cancel_yn is null group by a.dong , b.view_month order by b.view_month asc , a.dong asc

/* AdvertiseDAO.hakwonRegMonthPriceList */ select a.view_month , a.banner_size , a.price , a.dong_count , a.total_price from tb_advertise_req_pay_info a where a.advertise_req_no = #{reqNo} order by a.view_month asc
